core/size/box2iconmax.title: box2iconmax
core/size/box2iconmax.description: Number of icons that will fit in Box 2 (per row). Based on widget size and padding

core/tasker/fromtasker.title: fromtasker
core/tasker/fromtasker.description: State information sent from tasker to apply to "tasker/statedat". Only entitites listed in HA Tasker blueprint are sent.

core/status/currentstatus.title: currentstatus
core/status/currentstatus.description: Current status or last status displayed

core/status/setstatus.title: setstatus
core/status/setstatus.description: Send error id (##) to this to activate error

func/jsonmain.title: jsonmain
func/jsonmain.description: Load JSON data for following global variables

func/jsonstate.title: jsonstate
func/jsonstate.description: Get the current state of devices connected to the widget. Call with ".box1.row2.0"

func/alignment.title: alignment
func/alignment.description: Variables for use in alignment globals and objects

func/theme.title: theme
func/theme.description: Variables for use in theme globals and objects

func/devjsonadd.title: devjsonadd
func/devjsonadd.description: Device State - Add newlines and spaces to JSON

func/devjsonindent.title: devjsonindent
func/devjsonindent.description: Device State - Add indentation to JSON

func/devjsonnew.title: devjsonnew
func/devjsonnew.description: Device State - Add new entity to bottom of list

json/template.title: template

readme.title: README
readme.entries:
Thanks for downloading HA Device Control Widget! Setup:
1. Use following settings to configure the UI for the style you want
2. Once UI is configured, read the setup instructions by clicking on the button in the widget.
Please note you'll need to have Tasker installed to facilitate communication to HA

The below global settings are to configure the interface, while HA communication is set up on each icon.
Box 1 - Smaller box, usually containing main device controls like power
Box 2 - Larger box, usually containing device controls such as volume or brightness

Created by Corey Welsh to fill the need of universal Home Assistant Android widget

settheme.title: settheme
settheme.description: Select the theme you'd like to use on this widget. You can also select a style, then hit "theme" to modify it

theme.title: theme
theme.description: Custom theme settings or override specific variables

theme/themeinfo.title: themeinfo
theme/themeinfo.entries: Override colors, generate and filter colors and configure padding. See readme for details

theme/colors.title: colors
theme/colors.description: Override theme colors. Clear or delete to reset

theme/colorgen.title: colorgen
theme/colorgen.description: Generate colors for your widget from the system

theme/colorgen/adjcolor.title: adjcolor
theme/colorgen/adjcolor.description: Strength of color tone - 0 = White, 100 = Black

theme/colorgen/output.title: output
theme/colorgen/output.description: Result of your custom color. Copy to "colors" folder

theme/coloreditor.title: coloreditor
theme/coloreditor.description: Edit colors for your widget from the system

theme/coloreditor/editcolor.title: edit
theme/coloreditor/editcolor.description: Select the color to edit from your wallpaper, the current theme/the "colors" folder
theme/coloreditor/editcolor.entries: 0##Background1,1##Background2,2##Icon Off,3##Icon On,4##Ring Off,5##Ring On,6##Border Color,7##Wallpaper Color 1,8##Wallpaper Color 2

theme/coloreditor/output.title: output
theme/coloreditor/output.description: Result of your custom color. Copy to "colors" folder

theme/ringshape.title: ringshape
theme/ringshape.description: Shape of the rings behind the objects

theme/ringsize.title: ringsize
theme/ringsize.description: Size of the rings behind the objects - % bigger then Icon

theme/opacity.title: opacity
theme/opacity.description: Set the opacity of the widget background

theme/border.title: border
theme/border.description: Turn on a border around your boxes

theme/bordersize.title: bordersize
theme/bordersize.description: Set the size of the border

theme/objpadding.title: objpadding
theme/objpadding.description: Set the object padding across each row/column

theme/objpadding2.title: objpadding2
theme/objpadding2.description: Set the object padding between the two rows/columns

theme/objpaddingside.title: objpaddingside
theme/objpaddingside.description: Set the object padding from the edge of the box to the first icon

theme/verticalpadding.title: verticalpadding
theme/verticalpadding.description: Select the widget vertical padding size

theme/horizontalpadding.title: horizontalpadding
theme/horizontalpadding.description: Select the horizontal widget padding size

theme/cornerradius.title: cornerradius
theme/cornerradius.description: Set the radius of the rounded corners

entities/entitynote.title: entitynote
entities/entitynote.entries: "ENTITY LIST\n\nIf you're only controlling one device, enter it in "entity1". If you're controlling more than one, enter them in the order they appear in the template. (1st device is "entity1", 2nd is "entity2", etc)"

devicetype.title: devicetype
devicetype.description: Select the type of device you'd like to control
devicetype.entries: DATA##"Select the type of device you'd like to control",light##Lights,climate##Climate,tv##Television,sound##Sound System,security##Security,lock##Doors and Locks,power##Charging and Battery,remote##Remote control,appliance##Home Appliances,home##Home Features?,electronics#Personal Electronics,maintence##Home Maintence,other##Others

templateselect.title: templateselect
templateselect.entries: DATA##"Select the template style you'd like to use for the device selected above",1##Template 1,2##Template 2,3##Template 3,4##Template 4,5##Template 5,6##Template 6,0##Custom Template

templateinfo.title: templateselect
templateinfo.value:
light - 2-4 Device(s), 2 Row(s), 2 Boxes
Connect 2-4 light entities for this template
This widget is incorrectly sized for this template. \nEither make the widget larger or choose a different template. \nAdvanced users see README for alternative options

fitmoreobj.title: fitmoreobj
fitmoreobj.description: Disable widget object count restrictions to use templates that are close to fitting. May cause overlap

deviceiconrotation.title: deviceiconrotation
deviceiconrotation.entries: DATA##"Rotate or flip the device icon on your Widget",NONE##0 Degrees,DEG90##90 Degrees,DEG180##180 Degrees,DEG270##180 Degrees,FLIP_X##Flip Vertically,FLIP_Y##Flip Horizontally

deviceiconsize.title: deviceiconsize
deviceiconsize.description:
Set the size of the Device Icon.
Default: 120kpx

iconsize.title: iconsize
iconsize.description:
Set the size of the object icons.
Default: 80kpx

appiconvis.title: appiconvis
appiconvis.description: Set visbility of app-launcher object(s). On = Hidden

appiconsize.title: appiconsize
appiconsize.description:
Set the size of the small app-launcher object(s).
Default: 32kpx

deviceopeneditor.title: deviceopeneditor
deviceopeneditor.description: Enable device icon click to open KWGT Editor. Can be disabled once widget is set up

boxtoggle.title: boxtoggle
boxtoggle.description: Set the order of the boxes on your widget

widgetorient.title: widgetorient
widgetorient.description: Set horizontal or vertical orientation of widget. Disable flow before changing. Off = Horizontal, On = Vertical

box1position.title: box1position
box1position.entries: LEFT##Left - Horizontal Layout, RIGHT##Right - Horizontal Layout, TOP##Top - Vertical Layout, BOTTOM##Bottom - Vertical Layout

box1size.title: box1size
box1size.description: Override Box 1 size set from Flow. Disable flow before changing

params.formula:
$lv(entity, tc(json, gv(core/tasker/fromtasker), ".entity_id"))$$lv(exists, if(tc(json, gv(json/device), "$.device_states[?(@.entity_id == '" + #entity + "')].entity_id") != "", 1, 0))$$lv(datawipe, tc(reg, tc(reg, gv(json/device), "
", ""), "\s", ""))$$lv(jsonwipe, tc(reg, tc(reg, gv(core/tasker/fromtasker), "
", ""), "\s", ""))$$lv(jsonrem, (if(#exists = 1, gv(func/devjsonrem), #datawipe)))$$lv(jsonout, tc(reg, #jsonrem, "\},\]\}", ("\}," + #jsonwipe + "\]\}")))$$lv(jsonline, gv(func/devjsonadd))$$lv(jarrcut, tc(split, tc(split, #jsonline, "[", 1), "]", 0))$$lv(jarredit, tc(reg,#jarrcut, "
", tc(utf, 0A) + "    "))$$lv(jaddspc, gv(func/devjsonindent))$$lv(jremblnk, tc(reg, #jaddspc, "\s
", ""))$$#jremblnk$

$lv(objfit, gv(core/size/box2iconmax))$$lv(posid, ".box_2.row_2." + (#objfit - 1))$$gv(func/jsontemp)$$lv(box1vis, if(#tboxsize = 0, ", 1 Box", ", 2 Boxes"))$$lv(ntdevnum, (if(#tdevct ~= "\d-\d",("Connect " + #tdevct + " " + gv(devicetype) + " entities for this template"),#tdevct = 4,("Connect up to 4 " + gv(devicetype) + " entities for this template, 1 per page"),("Connect " + #tdevct + " " + gv(devicetype) + " entities for this template"))))$$lv(ntwgtsize, (if(#objkey != #obj,"This widget is incorrectly sized for this template. \nEither make the widget larger or choose a different template. \nAdvanced users see README for alternative options","")))$$gv(devicetype) + " - " + #tdevct + " Device(s), " + #trowct + " Row(s)" + #box1vis$
$#ntdevnum$
$#ntwgtsize$

viewgroup_items.text_expression: $gv(core/currentstatus)$$if(gv(core/box1dir1) = DATA, "Error - One or more global list variables incorrectly set")$

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $gv(func/jsontemp)$$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, (if(#ticopos = 1, TOPLEFT, #ticopos = 2, CENTERRIGHT, #ticopos = 3, BOTTOMLEFT)),gv(box1position) = LEFT, (if(#ticopos = 1, TOPRIGHT, #ticopos = 2, CENTERLEFT, #ticopos = 3, BOTTOMRIGHT)),gv(box1position) = TOP, (if(#ticopos = 1, BOTTOMLEFT, #ticopos = 2, TOP, #ticopos = 3, BOTTOMRIGHT)),gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, (if(#ticopos = 1, TOPLEFT, #ticopos = 2, BOTTOM, #ticopos = 3, TOPRIGHT)))$

$gv(func/jsontemp)$$if(#ticopos = 3,(if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT,gv(box1position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)),(if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT,gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)))$
$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$
$if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPRIGHT)$

viewgroup_items.text_expression:
Widget Padding: $gv(func/theme)$$#padwgtver$ Side, $#padwgthor$ Top
Icon: $gv(iconsize)$kpx, $tc(reg, gv(core/size/box2iconmax), "\n", "")$ Vis
Icon Padding:$gv(theme/objpadding)$ Edge, $gv(theme/objpadding)$ MID

[bl=-10]Widget: $si(rwidth)$W, $si(rheight)$H, $si(rratio)$ 1:1
Box Area: $tc(reg, gv(core/size/box2minsize), "\n", "")$ Min, $gv(core/size/box2width)$W/$gv(core/size/box2height)$H

$lv(icon, gv(iconsize) + gv(theme/objpadding))$$lv(lgbox, if(gv(widgetorient) = 0, gv(core/size/box2width), gv(core/size/box2height)))$$lv(adjustment, if(gv(deviceappiconpadding) = 1, gv(appiconsize), 0))$$lv(boxsize, #lgbox - #adjustment)$Icon to size ratio: $mu(abs, #boxsize /#icon)$[/bl]

internal_formulas.position_anchor: $if(gv(box1position) = RIGHT, TOPLEFT, gv(box1position) = LEFT, TOPRIGHT,  gv(box1position) = TOP, BOTTOMLEFT,  gv(box1position) = BOTTOM, TOPLEFT)$
